title: Tilted Players, having fun to tilt them more without getting tilted.
body:
I when {{champion:86}} Garen adc, cus i get a ban fight with the Jungler pick. the reason was i just wrote, im gonna mute all in game. and this 2 unraged on my comment.
I mean. {{champion:119}} Draven adc, and mute all is a good reason, LOLZ. 

Anyway he ban the Draven and later in game, he strats a Harrasment Chat on me and All Chat.
As the second part. the Support Lux at lvl. change her lane to other than the bot lane, seen her build of 3 items nearly lvl up. (Normal Boots, Blue Support Item lvl 2, and 1250 AP stick item.)

So at the end of the Game 15 mins to 20 mins, they give up hardly and "push" the middle lane. Let-ing the enemy reach the castle. and get a Victory. Then the Jungler. End with "We could win with a Draven, but NOOOO we had a Garen."

{{champion:2}} Olaf - Jungler - 
{{champion:99}} Lux - "Support" -

Note: Tried to do the Submit with the Support Web but it said i need to be logged in, that i am. but nothing.
Link:
[https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new]

replies.body:
What the fuck did i just read.

Oh. 

Even the lux did twice as much damage as you, everyone else did more. Consider not being bad before you blame your team.

well i dont have a correct link to report the issue i got in my last game. So sorry if you didnt understood.
ik, this isnt a good and propper actitude from me and from that Olaf and Lux, but im still lvl 24, yet almost 25. Much to learn, and im trying to be a good player with the rules that the game have created.

Quote to ~ Ulanopo: The link i cant use it, give me a correc tlink so i can reply this correctly.
Remove the names from your post. Naming and shaming is against board rules.
please write this in whatever your native tongue is and then run it through google translate or something.

> [{quoted}](name=FlyingRoboticCow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nILJXZ7n,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-03-22T06:15:47.807+0000)
>
> please write this in whatever your native tongue is and then run it through google translate or something.

That tends to be equally unintelligible for anything this complex.
